column1: self-contained emergency eyewash or shower equipment - COMPLETE DEF: Class:“emergency eyewash or shower equipment” & Properties:”Self-contained”: TRUE
column2: an piece of emergency was equipment that is a stand-alone device containing flushing fluid.

column1: plumbed emergency eyewash or shower equipment - COMPLETE DEF: Class: “emergency eyewash or shower equipment” & Properties:”plumbed”: TRUE
column2: an piece of emergency was equipment that is connected to a continual source of potable water.
A supplementary device that supports plumbed and/or self-contained units, by delivering immediate flushing fluid to the eyes or body.
An interconnected assembly of emergency equipment supplied by a single source of flushing fluid. (ANSI)

1) A device used to provide fluid to irrigate and flush the eyes.
2) A device used to provide fluid to irrigate and flush both the face and the eyes simultaneously. (ANSI)
A device specifically designed and intended to deliver flushing fluid in sufficient volume to cause that fluid to cascade over the entire body. (ANSI)
